metadata.title: USN-4128-2 -- Tomcat vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that the Tomcat 9 SSI printenv command echoed user  provided data without escaping it. An attacker could possibly use this  issue to perform an XSS attack. (CVE-2019-0221)  It was discovered that Tomcat 9 did not address HTTP/2 connection window exhaustion on write while addressing CVE-2019-0199. An attacker could  possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2019-10072)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4128-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  tomcat9-docs - 9.0.16-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 libtomcat9-embed-java - 9.0.16-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 tomcat9-admin - 9.0.16-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 tomcat9-common - 9.0.16-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 libtomcat9-java - 9.0.16-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 tomcat9-user - 9.0.16-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 tomcat9 - 9.0.16-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 tomcat9-examples - 9.0.16-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 No subscription required
